definition: big/stream or canal/drain/ditch/CL:條|条[tiao2]/him (dialect)/outer rim of a carriage wheel (old)
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
lit. where water flows, a canal is formed (idiom)/fig. when conditions are right, success will follow naturally
Qu county in Dazhou 達州|达州[Da2 zhou1], Sichuan
Sêrxü county (Tibetan: ser shul rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州, Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)/name of several historical figures
Sêrxü county (Tibetan: ser shul rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州, Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)/name of several historical figures
Lingqu canal in Xing'an county 興安|兴安, Guanxi, build in 214 BC to join Changjiang 長江|长江 with Pearl River 珠江

sentences.english: The roads and aqueducts of Rome have been the admiration of all after ages.
sentences.chinese: 古罗马的大道和高架渠在其后的年代一直受到羡慕。

sentences.english: In early July 2010, the lake finally began flowing over the spillway.
sentences.chinese: 2010年7月初，堰塞湖终于通过泄洪渠开始放水。

sentences.english: One can see the different drains and source… together with the gconsumeds used to control the current.
sentences.chinese: 你不妨看到不同的源和渠，跟随用来控制电流的门。

sentences.english: Come on, we'll swim over this thing.
sentences.chinese: 快点，我们还是从上面游过这道渠。

sentences.english: In this paper, the application of the piping in canal irrigation district is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文阐述了管道输水灌溉在渠灌区中的应用形式。

sentences.english: We put 21 million man-days digging ditches and pulling down dams.
sentences.chinese: 为了掘渠翻坝，曾使用了两千一百万个人工。

sentences.english: He kidnaps her after a fashion shoot and brings her down to the sewers.
sentences.chinese: 他绑架后，她和时装拍摄带来了她从污水渠。

sentences.english: It is used for clear food packaging and plumbing pipe.
sentences.chinese: 它被使用为透明食品包装和渠管子。

sentences.english: One can see the different drains and source, along with the gates used to control the current.
sentences.chinese: 你可以看到不同的源和渠，伴随用来控制电流的门。

sentences.english: It is modified in order to provide an extra channel for the pitch servo.
sentences.chinese: 那是改动，以降求分外的渠讲，让脚球场伺服。

definition: to pilot a ship/to channel water/to draw water (for irrigation)
old road/old way/old course (of a river)
Jing, one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/surname Jing
